name: Fresh Lime Curd
author: Sarah
summary: When life gives you a bunch of limes, make lime curd! This twist on traditional lemon curd uses limes instead. Use it as a cake filling, or any other way you desire.
directions: Place the sugar, butter, lime juice, lime zest in the top of a double boiler;  stir over medium-high heat until butter melts
Mix 2 tablespoons hot lime mixture into the eggs and stir to blend
Reduce heat to medium until water simmers
Slowly whisk egg mixture into the lime mixture
Cook over the double boiler until lime mixture thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon, 20 to 25 minutes
Cool slightly and spoon into a clean, glass jar
